name: Prana Sunrise Sweatshirt - Women's
description:
A soft, comfy crew-neck with a large kangaroo pocket to keep your hands cozy. The Sunrise sweatshirt is made from a soft, double-knit recycled polyester and TENCEL™ blend, that has just the right amount of spandex for an easy stretch.Made from a soft recycled polyester blend.Tapered sleeves and deep cuffs keep the cold out.Standard fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
